mpicxx CMakeFiles/pbte_demo.dir/src/PhononBTE.cpp.o -o pbte_demo  -Wl,-rpath,/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/openmpi/lib libpbte.a /usr/local/mfem-mpi/lib/libmfem.a /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libHYPRE.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libmetis.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/openmpi/lib/libmpi_cxx.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/openmpi/lib/libmpi.so -lyaml-cpp
